biotools.summary: Test for association in genome-wide association studies (GWAS) using a standard linear mixed model to account for population stratification and sample structure. It calculates exact Wald or likelihood ratio test statistics and p-values, and is computationally efficient for large GWAS.

bioschemas.name: GEMMA
